channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Supreme Court seems ready to let Trump fire independent commissioners
item.description: The Supreme Court appeared poised to allow President Trump to fire members of the Federal Trade Commission during oral arguments Monday. Why it matter...

item.title: Republican unity crumbles as America's mood sours
item.description: The honeymoon period of the second Trump administration has given way to a new phase where elected Republicans have grown emboldened to defy the presi...

item.title: Alina Habba resigns as acting U.S. attorney after disqualification
item.description: President Trump's former personal lawyer Alina Habba stepped down as acting U.S. attorney for New Jersey on Monday. Why it matters: Habba was recently...

item.title: This week's expected rate cut could be the last one for a while
item.description: Look for a rate cut this week. Just don't count on more anytime soon. The big picture: That is the likely outcome of a two-day Federal Reserve policy ...

item.title: Santa hats and tanks: Trump's deportation agenda adopts Christmas memes
item.description: The Department of Homeland Security shared Christmas-themed social media posts promoting its deportation agenda ahead of the holiday season. Why it ma...

item.title: Supreme Court poised to expand Trump’s power over independent agencies
item.description: A ruling in favor of Trump’s position has been expected by legal experts because the justices have been chipping away at a precedent known as Humphrey...

item.title: Alina Habba, Trump’s embattled New Jersey prosecutor, says she will leave role
item.description: In a statement, Habba said she resigned “to protect the stability and integrity of the office which I love.”

item.title: Allred drops Senate bid in Texas, will instead run for redrawn House seat
item.description: The former Democratic congressman, who lost his 2024 Senate bid to Sen. Ted Cruz (R-Texas), says a bruising Senate primary could threaten party unity.

item.title: Trump announces $11 billion tariff relief for farmers
item.description: Farmers — particularly those who produce soybeans — have felt the effect of the president’s tariff policies.

item.title: One night inside the ‘Trump Kennedy Center’
item.description: The president reveled in his control of the arts facility, as his allies cheered his hosting duties and called to rename the building after him.

item.title: How Russia keeps raising an army to replace its dead
item.description: An online bazaar of freelance headhunters finds new recruits to fight Ukraine, emboldening Vladimir Putin at the negotiating table and scaring Europea...

item.title: White House bullish on economic growth as Thanksgiving spending rises
item.description: Economic adviser Kevin Hassett dismissed economic bedwetters, saying strong spending bodes well for the economy.

item.title: Trump, stung by Republican losses, stands his ground on affordability
item.description: Democrats running on cost-of-living anxieties outperformed Republicans in Tuesday’s elections by greater-than-expected margins. The president chalked ...

item.title: Voters on Tuesday rewarded Democrats who addressed economic costs. Hours later, Trump said he delivered an 'economic miracle.'
item.description: A recent poll found a majority of Americans feel they’re spending more on groceries than they did a year ago.

item.title: Reaganomics in Jersey: Jack Ciattarelli has a supply-side dream if he’s elected governor this week
item.description: The Republican nominee has promised tax cuts and economic growth, but the numbers are fuzzy.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
